name: Oracle Hospitality
title: oracle.com
payoff: Efficient operations from lobby to back office
shortDescription: Oracle Hospitality provides integrated technology solutions for the hospitality industry, focusing on efficient operations across various sectors including hotels, cruises, and restaurants. It offers tools like property management systems, POS, and loyalty programs to enhance guest experiences and streamline operations. An example use case is a hotel using Oracle's OPERA Cloud to manage reservations and guest services seamlessly.
cons: Complexity in integration with existing systems
Possible steep learning curve for new users
